## Source: amazon-inspector (d15f2b16fc6904b39ed8ae073822dc4a01bf2613ba243b3c2787740dd3cf2fc4)
The package airbnb-vermeer-node was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5d0946afb04854d2b08aa05a71daab475236d7c62c29b4d419937b924476e1fa)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'airbnb-vermeer-node' @ 95.6.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
